title: Um ok then Facebook
body:
Just found this on Facebook. 
I think i might change to League of Immortals

replies.body:
Social network games and mobile gaming as a whole is an abomination atm, it's a cesspool of mediocre products, stolen contents, mass rip-off trains and other kinds of wonders.

Decent things are too far in between there.
They should have said "Meet the new Hero guaranteed to stand by your side." or is that pushing it?
league of legend ripp off league of immortal

Dota 2 did it first... Did you not see the title **hero** to describe the strapping gentleman
